trans-unit.source: Represents an integer value that is either 1 or 0 to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
Any non-zero value is interpreted as 1.

The key difference between a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> structure and a standard Boolean value is that, where a standard Boolean has two possible values, `true` and `false`, a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> structure has three possible values, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False>, or <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure using the supplied Boolean value.
The value for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure; either `true` or `false`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure using the specified integer value.
The integer whose value is to be used for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
Computes the bitwise AND operation of two specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structures.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the logical AND operation.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure as a byte.
The byte value will be either 0 or 1.
A byte representing the value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.

Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> object to the supplied <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> object and returns an indication of their relative values.
Any instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean>, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref><xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> object to compare, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and value.
Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance is less than value.
Zero
This instance is equal to value.
A positive integer
This instance is greater than value.
-or-
value is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
Any instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean>, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
An object to compare, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and value.
Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance is less than value.
Zero
This instance is equal to value.
A positive integer
This instance is greater than value.
-or-
value is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Compares the supplied object parameter to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.
The object to be compared.
`true` if object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> and the two are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structures to determine whether they are equal.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True"></xref> if the two instances are equal or <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False"></xref> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.

Represents a false value that can be assigned to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False> field is a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> structure.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
A `string` value that indicates the XSD of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
If either instance of `x` or `y` is null, the value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> will be null.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is `true` if the first instance is greater than the second instance; otherwise `false`.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> to determine whether the first is greater than or equal to the second.
If either instance of `x` or `y` is null, the value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> will be null.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is `true` if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance; otherwise `false`.
Indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null>, this property still will be `false`.
`true` if `Value` is `False`; otherwise, `false`.
Indicates whether this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure is null.
For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md).
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure is null; otherwise `false`.
Indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null>, this property still will be `false`.
`true` if `Value` is `True`; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> to determine whether the first is less than the second.
If either instance of `x` or `y` is null, the value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> will be null.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is `true` if the first instance is less than the second instance; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> to determine whether the first is less than or equal to the second.
If either instance of `x` or `y` is null, the value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> will be null.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is `true` if the first instance is less than or equal to the second instance; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> for equality.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False"></xref> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Represents <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> that can be assigned to this instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null> field is a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> structure.
For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md).

Represents a one value that can be assigned to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.ByteValue"></xref> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.One> field is a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> structure.
Performs a one's complement operation on the supplied <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structures.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The one's complement of the supplied <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.
Computes the bitwise AND operation of two specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structures.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.And%2A> oolean)?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=False
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the logical AND operation.
Computes the bitwise OR of its operands.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Or%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The results of the logical OR operation.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> for equality.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.Equals%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True"></xref> if the two instances are equal or <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False"></xref> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR (XOR) operation on the supplied parameters.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Xor%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the logical XOR operation.
The false operator can be used to test the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> to determine whether it is false.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean?displayProperty=fullName>
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to be tested.
Returns `true` if the supplied parameter is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> is false, `false` otherwise.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
If either instance of `x` or `y` is null, the value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> will be null.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Compare%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is `true` if the first instance is greater than the second instance; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is greater than or equal to the second.
If either instance of `x` or `y` is null, the value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> will be null.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Compare%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is `true` if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> to determine whether they are not equal.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString.NotEquals%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False"></xref> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> to determine whether the first is less than the second.
If either instance of `x` or `y` is null, the value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> will be null.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Compare%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is `true` if the first instance is less than the second instance; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> to determine whether the first is less than or equal to the second.
If either instance of `x` or `y` is null, the value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> will be null.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Compare%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is `true` if the first instance is less than or equal to the second instance; otherwise, `false`.
Performs a NOT operation on a <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> on which the NOT operation will be performed.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> with the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref><xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True"></xref> if argument was true, <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref> if argument was null, and <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False"></xref> otherwise.
Performs a one's complement operation on the supplied <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structures.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.OnesComplement%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The one's complement of the supplied <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.
The true operator can be used to test the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> to determine whether it is true.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean?displayProperty=fullName>
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to be tested.
Returns `true` if the supplied parameter is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> is true, `false` otherwise.
Performs a bitwise OR operation on the two specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structures.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure whose Value is the result of the bitwise OR operation.
Converts the specified <xref href="System.String"></xref> representation of a logical value to its <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> equivalent.
The <xref href="System.String"></xref> to be converted.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure that contains the parsed value.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref>.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref> structure whose value is 1 or 0.
If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value equals `true`, the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref> structure's value is 1.
Otherwise, the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref> structure's value is 0.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose value is 1 or 0.
If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value equals `true` then the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure's value is 1.
Otherwise, the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure's value is 0.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble"></xref>.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble"></xref> structure whose value is 1 or 0.
If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value equals `true` then the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble"></xref> structure's value is 1.
Otherwise, the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble"></xref> structure's value is 0.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>.
A new `SqlInt16` structure whose value is 1 or 0.
If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value equals `true` then the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure's value is 1.
Otherwise, the new `SqlInt16` structure's value is 0.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32"></xref>.
A new `SqlInt32` structure whose value is 1 or 0.
If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value equals `true`, the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32"></xref> structure's value is 1.
Otherwise, the new `SqlInt32` structure's value is 0.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64"></xref>.
A new `SqlInt64` structure whose value is 1 or 0.
If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value equals `true`, the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64"></xref> structure's value is 1.
Otherwise, the new `SqlInt64` structure's value is 0.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney"></xref>.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney"></xref> structure whose value is 1 or 0.
If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value equals `true`, the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney"></xref> value is 1.
If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value equals `false`, the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney"></xref> value is 0.

If <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value is neither 1 nor 0, the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney"></xref> value is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney.Null"></xref>.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle"></xref>.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle"></xref> structure whose value is 1 or 0.

If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value equals true, the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle"></xref> structure's value is 1; otherwise the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle"></xref> structure's value is 0.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString"></xref>.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString"></xref> structure whose value is 1 or 0.
If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value equals `true` then <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString"></xref> structure's value is 1.
Otherwise, the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString"></xref> structure's value is 0.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure to a string.
A string that contains the value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.
If the value is null, the string will contain "null".

Represents a true value that can be assigned to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True> field is a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> structure.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure's value.
This property is read-only.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True"></xref>; otherwise `false`.
The property is set to null.
Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied parameters.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the logical XOR operation.

Represents a zero value that can be assigned to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.ByteValue"></xref> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Zero> field is a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> structure.
This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
An `XmlSchema`.
